title: 水不能流
author: 任务栏MEMZ
txt_content: 我今天进服务器，别人造了一个大型刷石机，可是水流动禁止了，谁能告诉我解开的指令。

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
可能是residence造成的 修改plugins\residence\config.yml
找到这一段
    Flow:
      # Level from which one to start lava and water flow blocking
      # This dont have effect in residence area
      Level: 120
      # With this set to true, lava flow outside residence is blocked
      NoLavaFlow: false
      # With this set to true, water flow outside residence is blocked
      NoWaterFlow: false
      Worlds:
      - world复制代码
把NoLavaFlow和NoWaterFlow都设置成false

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: 阻止水流动是用的插件而非命令

replies.author: 任务栏MEMZ
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-5-9 10:11
可能是residence造成的 修改plugins\residence\config.yml
找到这一段
谢谢大佬，成功了
